channel.title: Aryan - Rebirth
channel.description:
My attempt at making a new bot.
It dynamically downloads the files of Jagex's site and injects the code to make it believe it's running in a browser. Don't complain about bandwith - you are using the same amount in viewing the game directly from their site. The program can acess all variables so this is more than a client.
This is still in the development stage. No leachers. Don't post asking when it will be done. I need your support so contibute.
Anybody who uses this code releases it as open source - for FREE. That's right impsoft... NO.

item.title: Aryan - Rebirth
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“BAsh, post:40, topic:3441”]Hit a major snag - although i can redirect mouse events to the client… The client is taping into the core keyevent dispatcher.
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/awt/KeyboardFocusManager.html

What this means:
It can see that the events arn’t going to it - it’s going to us!!!
We can’t block events and any emulation will have to be at the core level.

It’s going to take me a few hours (only), to get through this so please be patient

Is mopar being ddosed??? My loading times are slow and sometimes i get smf errors. - Solution: redirect to impsoft.[/quote]

you could just a glasspane to redirect mousemovements and also to block them

im not being ddosed, my stupid host wont listen to me about the fact that they are having severe sql server problems, i keep getting the generic “we are keeping an eye on the problem” responses :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Aryan - Rebirth
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

Hit a major snag - although i can redirect mouse events to the client… The client is taping into the core keyevent dispatcher.
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/awt/KeyboardFocusManager.html

What this means:
It can see that the events arn’t going to it - it’s going to us!!!
We can’t block events and any emulation will have to be at the core level.

It’s going to take me a few hours (only), to get through this so please be patient

Is mopar being ddosed??? My loading times are slow and sometimes i get smf errors. - Solution: redirect to impsoft.

Read full topic

item.title: Aryan - Rebirth
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

BAsh:

Aryan scripts won’t work with this - and never will - Aryan was flawed in that it hacked the clients methods and fields. This bot (when completed) will operate entirely through mouse and keyboard input and as such the old scripts will have to be modified.

I would suggest not calling it aryan, but its your bot

Read full topic

item.description:

in the old deob,

final class Class30 implements MouseListener, MouseMotionListener {

public final synchronized void mouseMoved(MouseEvent mouseevent) {
do {

break;

Class27_Sub11_Sub10.anInt2159 = mouseevent.getY();
} catch (RuntimeException runtimeexception) {
throw Class27_Sub11_Sub3_Sub6.method409(runtimeexception,
(“md.mouseMoved(”
+ (mouseevent != null ? “{…}” : “null”) + ‘)’));
}
break;
} while (false);
}

public final synchronized void mouseExited(MouseEvent mouseevent) {
    do {
        try {
            anInt647++;
            if (Class26.aClass30_1405 == null) {
                break;
            }
            Class59.anInt1154 = 0;
            Class27_Sub11_Sub3_Sub6.anInt2690 = -1;

                Class60.anInt1195 = 2;

            } else {
                Class60.anInt1195 = 1;
                Class19.anInt426 = 1;
            }
        }
        if (mouseevent.isPopupTrigger()) {
